casebody.data:
H.R., Plaintiff-Petitioner,
and
I.R., Plaintiff,
v.
The NEW JERSEY STATE PAROLE BOARD, Defendant-Respondent. H.R., Plaintiff,
and
I.R., Plaintiff,
v.
The New Jersey State Parole Board, Defendant. C-1044 September Term 2018
082373 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 11, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-2843/2987-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
